data.actual_result: It uploads the file, then the progress bar gets stuck for 1-2 minutes, until it disappears without leaving any trace but a `<-- HTTP FAILED: java. net. SocketTimeoutException: timeout` line in debug log
data.expected_result: Uploads the file and then Clyde message should pop up upon failure
data.short_description: Attempting to send a file to a person who blocked you will cause the upload progress to get stuck until socket timeout
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a DM with a person who blocked you - Tap Add file button - Select a file - Send
